Apache 2.0
Please hold steady to scan QR
No camera found.
Failed to open camera preview.
Camera access denied!
You must allow camera access to scan QR codes.
Camera closed to save battery.
Would you like to register with the following server?
Would you like to authenticate with the following server?
Please make sure the following characters match those in your browser:
The QR you have scanned is not a 2Q2R-compliant key.
Sorry, but you are not registered with this server.
An authentication request was just received from an unknown server. Perhaps you deleted your key.
Sorry, but you do not appear to be registered with this account.
The registrations for this device are corrupted! Would you like to manually edit the file, or delete it?
Your device is outdated. Please upgrade to Android 4.4 (KitKat) or newer.
Sorry, there was an error generating a key-pair for your registration. Please make sure your phone has password protection turned on, and try again.
Error while retrieving your key! Please double-check to make sure this is the device you decided to authenticate with, and your phone must also have a password in order to access keys securely.
It appears you already have this device registered to your account, meaning you can just go ahead and use it to authenticate.
Sorry, the authentication could not be completed because your phone has not been authorized recently enough. Please lock and unlock your phone, then scan the QR again.
An error was encountered while producing a registration response for the server. Please try scanning the QR again.
An error was encountered while producing an authentication response for the server. Please try scanning the QR again
Your device is not connected to the internet. Please connect and try again.
There was an error while retrieving info from the server.
There was an error while sending the registration to the server.
There was an error while sending the authentication to the server.
You just received an expired authentication attempt! This could mean a third party is trying to use your key to verify themselves!
